text: Sondra Locke (May 28, 1944 - November 3, 2018) was an American actress who was known for starring mostly in movies. She starred as Laura Lee in The Outlaw Josey Wales in 1976. The following year, she played Augustina Mally in The Gauntlet (1977). Locke was born in Shelbyville, Tennessee. Locke was nominated for Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role as Mick Kelly in The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter (1968). Locke died in Los Angeles, California on November 3, 2018 from cardiac arrest complicated by breast and bone cancer, aged 74. ==References== Category:Actors from Tennessee Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Sondra Locke
